lead_paragraph: In this warmly countrified Italian setting with pots of herbs, there is a wood-burning fireplace where the chef and partner, Shea Gallante, will put the finishing touches on breads baked in-house. The Italian menu (pdf; a list of dishes without prices) will have an emphasis on vegetable-based dishes. On the second floor there is dining in a wine room, which can be used for private parties, and at a 10-seat chef's table with its own little kitchen. Stratis Morfogen, the managing partner, and his sommelier, John Slover, will allow guests to share bottles of wine between tables. (Opens Nov. 5); 45 East 22nd Street, (212) 982-8422, cianonyc.com.
snippet: The Italian menu will have an emphasis on vegetable-based dishes.

headline.main: Ciano Gears Up for Its Opening

abstract: The Italian menu will have an emphasis on vegetable-based dishes.
